g.text: Converts 4 input lines to 2-bit binary code. Only one input active at a time.
V = I₀ + I₁ + I₂ + I₃ + I₄ + I₅ + I₆ + I₇
Priority encoder handles multiple active inputs. Highest priority input determines output.
Converts 2-bit binary input to 4 mutually exclusive outputs. Only one output HIGH.
• Only one input active at time
• Output = binary code of input position
• Only one output active at time
• Decoder output can feed encoder input
